pages.text: Death in $(thing)Crucial$() works in a slightly different manner from vanilla.$(br2)Should you die, a $(item)Totem of Holding$() will spawn in your deathbed, and will hold any items you were carrying on you. If you manage to reach the totem without dying again, simply whack it a few times to get your stuff back. If you die on the way, though, your items will fall to the ground.
